caption.p: Protective effect of the Protaetia brevitarsis seulensis’ water extract (PBWE) on the number of Fluoro-Jade C (FJC)-positive degenerating neurons in the dentate gyrus (DG) of hippocampus on day 4 post-trimethyltin (TMT)-treatment. ( a) Representative images (200×) show degenerating FJC-stained cells (green color) in the saline-treated control, TMT-treated control, and PBWE-pretreated TMT groups. ( b) Graph depicts the number of FJC-positive cells per DG, in the hippocampus sections ( n = 4 in each group). Values are reported as mean ± SE. ### p < 0.001 vs. saline-treated group, * p < 0.05 vs. TMT alone-treated group. Scale bar represents 40 μm. GCL, granular cell layer.
